FILE_COPY_SUCCESS.context: Success message after copying a file
FILE_COPY_SUCCESS.comments: Variables: {source} - source file path, {destination} - destination file path
FILE_COPY_SUCCESS.text: {source}から{destination}へのコピーに成功しました

FILE_MOVE_SUCCESS.context: Success message after moving a file
FILE_MOVE_SUCCESS.comments: Variables: {source} - source file path, {destination} - destination file path
FILE_MOVE_SUCCESS.text: {source}から{destination}への移動に成功しました

FILE_LIST_SUCCESS.context: Success message after listing a directory
FILE_LIST_SUCCESS.text: ディレクトリの一覧表示に成功しました: {directory}

FILE_COPY_START.context: Log message when starting to copy a file
FILE_COPY_START.comments: Variables: {source} - source file path, {destination} - destination file path

FILE_MOVE_START.context: Log message when starting to move a file
FILE_MOVE_START.comments: Variables: {source} - source file path, {destination} - destination file path

FILE_LIST_START.context: Log message when starting to list a directory
FILE_LIST_START.text: ディレクトリを一覧表示しています: {directory}
